name: ManagedSettingsStore
desc: A data store that applies settings to the current user or device.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new instance of a store.

items.name: protocol ManagedSettingsGroup
items.desc: A group of settings to manage.

items.name: var account: AccountSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect accounts.

items.name: struct AccountSettings
items.desc: An object that configures whether a user can modify their device’s account settings.

items.name: var cellular: CellularSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect cellular networking.

items.name: struct CellularSettings
items.desc: Constraints on the user’s cellular networking settings.

items.name: var dateAndTime: DateAndTimeSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect the date and time.

items.name: struct DateAndTimeSettings
items.desc: Constraints on the device’s date and time settings.

items.name: var passcode: PasscodeSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect the device passcode.

items.name: struct PasscodeSettings
items.desc: Constraints on a user’s ability to change their device’s passcode.

items.name: var shield: ShieldSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect what activities the system covers with a shielding view on this device.

items.name: struct ShieldSettings
items.desc: Constraints that indicate what apps and websites to cover with a shielding view.

items.name: var siri: SiriSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect Siri.

items.name: struct SiriSettings
items.desc: Constraints on the device’s Siri settings.

items.name: var appStore: AppStoreSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect the App Store.

items.name: struct AppStoreSettings
items.desc: Constraints on a user’s App Store settings.

items.name: var application: ApplicationSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect applications.

items.name: struct ApplicationSettings
items.desc: Constraints on the apps and categories of apps a user can run on their device.

items.name: var effectiveMaximumMovieRating: Int
items.desc: The movie rating constraint that is active on this device.

items.name: var effectiveMaximumTVShowRating: Int
items.desc: The TV rating constraint that is active on this device.

items.name: var gameCenter: GameCenterSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect Game Center.

items.name: struct GameCenterSettings
items.desc: Constraints on the user’s Game Center settings.

items.name: var media: MediaSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect media.

items.name: struct MediaSettings
items.desc: Constraints on the media content the user can access.

items.name: var safari: SafariSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect Safari’s search results and cookie policies.

items.name: struct SafariSettings
items.desc: Constraints on Safari’s AutoFill and cookie behaviors.

items.name: var webContent: WebContentSettings
items.desc: Settings that affect web content.

items.name: struct WebContentSettings
items.desc: An object that configures which websites a user can access.

items.name: struct BoundedSettingMetadata
items.desc: Additional information about a bounded setting.

items.name: struct SettingMetadata
items.desc: Additional information about a configurable setting.

items.name: var objectWillChange: ObservableObjectPublisher
items.desc: A publisher that emits before the object has changed.

items.name: var $effectiveMaximumMovieRating: Published<Int>.Publisher
items.desc: The movie rating constraint that is active on this device.

items.name: var $effectiveMaximumTVShowRating: Published<Int>.Publisher
items.desc: The television show rating constraint that is active on this device.

items.name: typealias ObjectWillChangePublisher
items.desc: The type of publisher that emits before the object has changed.
